participant_2.background:
I often find myself getting distracted by social media when I should be working.
I enjoy spending time with my grandparents and hearing about their stories.
My family and I are close because we are all in on the joke.
I can work from home and still make enough money to provide for my family.

content.text: What is a recent memory that makes you smile?
My grandmother told me a story about when she was a little girl.
That sounds great! I love hearing stories from my grandparents. I remember when I was a kid, I used to spend all day playing video games with my friends. Those were the days.
I'm not big into video games, but I love watching crime dramas and documentaries. I like to learn about new things.
That's cool. I like to watch those too. I'm currently working on writing a novel, so I like to watch things that will help me with my writing.
That's awesome! I love reading. My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
That sounds cool. I like Halloween. I'm getting married in a park next month. It's going to be a great day.
That sounds amazing! I'm so happy for you.
I'm sure it will be a beautiful wedding
